pages.text: $(#00a8a8)Insight$(), or 'eyes on the inside,' is what allows you to understand the world around you, and achieve things beyond that of the mundane. It is something only certain people are truly capable of, and part of why we need you.

You can gain insight by $(6)completing quests$(), $(6)achieving advancements$(), by $(6)catching unusual fish$(), and by $(6)taking photos of creatures$().$(br2)If you $(6)defeat a spirit creature with the camera$(), you get bonus insight. They also say you gain insight when you $(6)lose your mind$().

You lose insight by dying, while being $(#00a800)extremely tired$(), or by spending it. This phenomenon is $(#00a800)beneficial$() at some levels, allowing you to $(#00a800)unlock new quests$() and $(#00a800)see hidden entities$(), but eventually becomes $(c)harmful$(), and will $(#00a800)wear away at your sanity$() if it goes too high.

Once you reach 10 or more Insight, you can leverage it to purchase items from the $(#00a800)Insight Shop$() (found in your quest book). Be aware that if you spend too much, it may take you longer to accomplish your goals.

Unique things will happen at levels $(#00a800)10$(), $(#00a800)20$(), $(#00a800)50$(), $(#00a800)100$(), and at $(c)150$() you will begin to experience adverse effects. Your insight will be shown on your screen, as you can see in the image to the right.$(br2)Keep an eye on it! (get it?)
